## Discussion

On Windows, interprets the root’s content as UTF-16 on Windows.

This property is equivalent to calling `String(decoding: root)`.

# string

**Instance Property**

On Unix, this returns `"/"`.

## Declaration

```swift
var string: String { get }
```

## Discussion

On Windows, interprets the root’s content as UTF-16 on Windows.

This property is equivalent to calling `String(decoding: root)`.
title: string
